column5: This is a luxury condo on the 5th floor w/ a balcony high above turn 2. Included are 8 entry passes and 8 parking passes. The condo has very recently been updated and remodeled. 1 bed and 1 bath with Balcony overlooking the Texas Motor Speedway track
column8: 8 Passes to Lone Star Tower @ Texas Motor Speedway
